org.primaresearch.shared.variable

Class BaseVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.shared.variable.BaseVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Variable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanVariable, DoubleVariable, IntegerVariable, StringVariable

    public abstract class BaseVariable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Variable
    Abstract base class for Variable implementations handling name, caption, description, ID, sort index, visibility and constraint.
    Author:
    clc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
